name: ask_agent
description:
Consult the code-architect for implementation guidance. The architect analyzes code/tests and provides difficulty ranking, key insights, and hints - NOT code.

Examples:
- {{tool:ask_agent}}({"prompt": "What are the tricky parts of this implementation?", "files": ["test.spec.js", "source.js"]})
- {{tool:ask_agent}}({"prompt": "Analyze these tests and identify edge cases", "files": ["test.spec.js"]})

prompt.description: The task or question for the agent

files.description: File paths to include as context. Contents will be shown to the agent.
